title: marandiDAmalE
sahitya:
marandiDAmalE irundu sirandiDAyO manamE varundiDAmal irundiDavE vaDivEl murugan tiruvaDiyai nI


anupallavi

  paranda perum kaDalinOram irundE tan aDiyArkku purindaruL purindu varum paraman tiruppAda malarai


caraNam    parandu oru nilaiyinilE irundiDAmalE alaindu tirindu varum tanmai unadu tirundi viDa iniyEnum 
siranda perum bhaktiyuDan karaindurugavE irandu tiruccendUrAn tiruvaruLai perum pEru peTriDavE
